requirements.name: enemyName
requirements.annotation: The name of the unit to collide with.

name: onCollision

args.name: x
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit

args.name: y
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit

args.name: dx
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: dy
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: stillPlaying
args.annotation: Set to false to end the game

annotation: Describes what happens whenever the unit collides with another one.

name: onSpawn

args.name: x
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit

args.name: y
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit

args.name: dx
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: dy
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: stillPlaying
args.annotation: Set to false to end the game

annotation: Describes what happens when the unit is spawned.

name: onDeath

args.name: x
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit

args.name: y
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit

args.name: dx
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: dy
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

args.name: stillPlaying
args.annotation: Set to false to end the game

annotation: Describes what happens when the unit dies.
